供え餠: (そなえもち) - offering of mochi rice cakes; mochi rice cakes used as offering
供す: (きょうす) - to offer; to present; to submit; to serve (a meal); to supply
供する: (きょうする) - to offer; to present; to submit; to serve (a meal); to supply
供に: (ともに) - together/jointly; (often as ...とともに) at the same time/with/as .../including/along with; both
供僧: (ぐそう) - monk who attends to the principal image of a temple; Buddhist monk serving at an attached Shinto shrine
供出米: (きょうしゅつまい) - (farmers') rice deliveries
供奉: (ぐぶ) - accompanying/being in attendance on; inner offerer (any of the 10 high-ranking monks serving at the inner offering hall)
供奉僧: (ぐぶそう) - monk who attends to the principal image of a temple; Buddhist monk serving at an attached Shinto shrine
供応: (きょうおう) - entertainment/treat/feast/banquet; immediately agreeing with someone else
供米: (くまい) - rice offered to a god
供給の弾力性: (きょうきゅうのだんりょくせい) - elasticity of supply
供給コスト: (きょうきゅうコスト) - supply cost
供給不足: (きょうきゅうぶそく) - short supply; supply shortage
供給地: (きょうきゅうち) - supply center; supply centre
供給源: (きょうきゅうげん) - source of supply
供給網: (きょうきゅうもう) - supply network; supply chain; distribution network
供給連鎖: (きょうきゅうれんさ) - supply chain
供給連鎖管理: (きょうきゅうれんさかんり) - supply chain management; SCM
供給過剰: (きょうきゅうかじょう) - oversupply (of goods, etc.); excessive supply
供給過多: (きょうきゅうかた) - excessive supply; oversupply

供華: (くうげ) - offering of flowers (at shrine, grave, etc.); floral tribute
供託金: (きょうたくきん) - deposit of money
供述: (きょうじゅつ) - affidavit; deposition; testimony
供述書: (きょうじゅつしょ) - affidavit; deposition; testimony
供述者: (きょうじゅつしゃ) - deponent; testifier
供餅: (ぐへい) - mochi rice cakes used as offering
供養: (くよう) - memorial service for the dead; holding a service
供餠: (ぐへい) - mochi rice cakes used as offering
依って: (よって) - therefore; consequently; accordingly; because of
依りて: (よりて) - as such; for that reason; therefore; consequently
依り代: (よりしろ) - object representative of a divine spirit; object to which a spirit is drawn or summoned; object or animal occupied by a kami
依る: (よる) - (esp. 依る;拠る) to be due to/to be caused by; (esp. 依る) to depend on/to turn on; (esp. 因る;由る) to be based on/to come from
依代: (よりしろ) - object representative of a divine spirit; object to which a spirit is drawn or summoned; object or animal occupied by a kami
依估地: (いこじ) - obstinate; stubborn; obdurate; headstrong; willful; perverse
依估贔屓: (えこひいき) - (yoji) favoritism; favouritism; partiality; prejudice; bias
依命: (いめい) - by order (of a superior); as instructed; official (e.g. notification)
依報: (えほう) - circumstantial retribution; circumstances (e.g. geographical, societal) one is born into because of karma in previous lives
依存状態: (いぞんじょうたい) - state of dependence
依存症: (いぞんしょう) - (alcohol, drug) dependence; morbid dependence (on alcohol)
依存適合性: (いぞんてきごうせい) - dependent conformance
依怙: (えこ) - favoritism; favouritism; partiality; prejudice; bias
依怙地: (えこじ) - obstinate; stubborn; obdurate; headstrong; willful; perverse
依怙贔屓: (えこひいき) - (yoji) favoritism; favouritism; partiality; prejudice; bias
依怙贔負: (えこひいき) - (yoji) favoritism; favouritism; partiality; prejudice; bias
依然: (いぜん) - still; as yet; as it has been
依蘭苔: (エイランタイ) - Iceland moss (Cetraria islandica); Iceland lichen
依託射撃: (いたくしゃげき) - firing from elbow rests
依頼: (irai) - request, commission, entrusting (com um assunto); dependence, reliance
依頼料: (いらいりょう) - retaining fee; retainer
依頼書: (いらいしょ) - written request; request for ...; application for ...
